New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit the fastest pitch recorded in MLB history
Shohei Ohtani became the only player in Dodgers history to record 10 RBIs in a single game
Shohei Ohtani finished with 50 home runs and 50 stolen bases in a single season
Shohei Ohtani set a record for most RBIs in a game in Dodgers history
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a two-RBI double in the third inning
Shohei Ohtani hit his second home run of the night off Mike Baumann in the seventh inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to score three more runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Los Angeles Dodgers clinched a postseason bid following their 20-4 win
Despite being down 12-3, the Miami Marlins continued pitching to Ohtani in the seventh inning
